name: CTColonography
title: CT Colonography
description: This value set is created for the MU3 measure
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains codes to identify a computed tomography colongraphy.),(Data Element Scope: This value set was intended to identify patients who had a computed tomography colonography.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes codes that indicate a computed tomography colonography.),(Exclusion Criteria: None.)
